content: Create a fork/copy of the nutrient-data-pilot for advanced prototype
Add potassium (K) mass balance to the advanced version
Build Key Operational Units (KOUs) structure - fields, livestock groups, feed stores, manure
Add field-by-field nutrient tracking instead of whole-farm
Build scenario planning tool for what-if analysis
Create farm nutrient map visualization with color-coded fields
Deploy advanced version to GitHub and Vercel
Fix nutrient pathways visualization - replace Sankey with flow diagram
Fix scenario planning component - add missing icon imports
Debug nutrient pathways - add diagnostic information
Add data input capability for KOUs and pathways
Implement proper Sankey diagram using D3.js or similar
